full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: 21401-230012 Rooftop Supplementary Air Conditioner (C)

#### Contract Information
* Reference number: WS4544481926
* Amendment number: 5
* Solicitation number: WS4544481926
* Publication date: 2024-04-18
* Tender closing date: 2024-05-15 14:00:00 EST
* Amendment date: 2024-05-10
* Expected contract start date: 2024-05-23
* Expected contract end date: 2024-06-01

#### Tender Overview
Canada is seeking offers from Offerors for the supply and installation of a rooftop supplementary air conditioning system into a 2019 Ford E450 Inmate Escort Vehicle, including ductwork to the inmate cell units, for Correctional Service Canada in Joyceville, Ontario.

#### Tender Evaluation
The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

#### Key Submission Requirements
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on [tender closing date] by 2:00 PM EDT.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
David Barltrop
SPAC/PSPC
Email: [david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: [Not available]
Fax: [Not available]

#### Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19444177?extsite=MTk0NDQxNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
